answers.answer: Congratulations on 30 days my friend! You get much respect and gratitude from me. Also to both of you, I wish you luck in kicking the smoking habit... do what you guys have to do :)
no cigs tomorrow it's gonna be a new me...Good Gawd what will i end up doing with all the money i am going to save on pills and cigs?

Kudos on 30 days rush! That is great! You have been an inspiration to muself and others on here, and always provide a great laugh! Thanks, and good luck quitting smoking. That will be the next vice I drop!
thank you my dear, hope your day goes well
thank you my dear...hope your day is wonderful

Yippie, Hoooray, Awesome!!!! I have to tell you, your humor, thick skin for teasing, strength and compassion is just plain unbelievable. Can't tell you how proud I am of your cleantime. You have shown that a positive attitude and a fruit cuttin friend can get you thru this addiction crap. (kiddin you bout the FC friend). Anyway, do something nice for yourself today and think of what you have left in your dust.....pills no more! Congrats!

HEY RUSH congrads on 30 days you hit the first milestone guard your clean time it is pricesless to all of us if your not going to work a program at least get a good book on addiction and recovery and start reading it knowledge is power and you need to edeucate yourself on addivtion so it dont run you over again the best of luck to you with your recovery.......Gnarly

Thank you so much for your kind words...it has been a struggle for sure, been offered pills more than once, but turned em down each time.  So glad for that.As for the fruit cutting friend...Steve...he was a huge help, even though he thought i had a virus...you people are the ones i have confided in.I am still hooked on the melon salads though...i tell you they are my new vics...anly good for me...can you get diabetes from too much fruit?
Congrats friend!! I'm sooo proud of you.I can't wait to have more fun and games in your next 30!!!
Congratulations on your clean time. Good luck quitting smoking!!
Congrats on your 30 clean days, Rush :) keep working and remember, GUARD UP

question: Congratulations my friend.  This is a milestone and I am very proud of you.Also give some strength to him and I as we stop smoking tomorrow.  Another addiction we don't need.
title: Rush has 30 days today!!!!
